name: Spin Mystery Wheel Challenge
description:
The best and latest spinner wheel app to play challenges is here! Enjoy this latest trendy game that will help you play spin the mystery wheel challenge game with the most famous challenges included. Simply play and click the wheels of your choice and make thousands of spin the mystery wheel challenges in your mobile devices. Play famous mystery wheel of slime challenge with it now you can also play with the famous food wheels, prank calls, foods makeup, girlfriend vs boyfriend, slime smoothies and so much more & Create your famous challenge blog videos with this best fortune wheel simulation game

You can also create the customized wheel of your choice by entering the fields of your choice to play this game at home.

The famous wheels already included are:

Mystery wheel of slime switch up challenge

Mystery wheel of makeup

Mystery wheel of ice cream, pizza, burger and so much more

And not to miss the Mystery Wheel of prank calls

You can also create spin wheels of your own choice and save them in DIY gallery to use them later for your videos. Rush now and download this spinner wheel app and spin for cash today!
